title: Golden Sands Resort, Penang Debuts Personal Transportation Robot
text:
Golden Sands Resort, Penang Debuts Personal Transportation Robot WEBWIRE – Friday, July 10, 2015 The Ninebot is a personal transportation robot. 
Golden Sands Resort Penang introduced a new mode of green transportation  Ninebot. The Ninebot is a personal transportation robot. 
Ninebot is operated by a series of complex microelectronic gyroscopes and sensors which consist of accelerometers and high-speed microprocessor. Riders can move the device forward or backwards simply by adjusting their balance. To turn the device, simply tilt the operating bar to the left or right, creating a difference in speed between the two wheels. 
The Ninebot promises fun for individuals of all ages from 9 years old onwards. Take a spin around the specially-designed outdoor track ensures an adventurous ride over different terrains and bends. Facilitators will be on hand to give training sessions for first-timers and safety gear is provided. 
The Ninebot service is Operated by JL Turf Equipment & Services Sdn Bhd as exclusive partnership with Golden Sands Resort. The Ninebot rides are located next to the resorts one stop family entertainment centre, Adventure Zone. 
Keith Tomkies, general manager of Golden Sands Resort, said We are pleased to present the Ninebot to our resort guests and to the local Penang community. We hope that this new activity will be well received and will provide entertainment for both young and old. We are a family-orientated resort and we hope that this will enhance the overall experience for guests and families, especially those between the ages of nine to 99. Tomkies added, A Ninebot ride is a quiet, reliable, responsive and eco-friendly, way to travel without overexerting yourself in the tropical heat. 
Ninebot rides at the Golden Sands Resort are open to resort guests and the public. Rides are 15 minutes per session and are priced at RM27 nett per person for resort guests and RM32 nett for local visitors (Prices are inclusive of 6% GST). The rides are available daily from 10am to 1pm and 2pm to 7pm. Patrons who utilise the Ninebot have to be at least 9 years old with a minimum height of 120 cm and weight between 25 kg and 110 kg. 
Hong Kong-based Shangri-La Hotels and Resorts currently owns and/or manages more than 90 hotels under the Shangri-La brand with a room inventory of over 38,000. Shangri-La hotels are five-star deluxe properties featuring extensive luxury facilities and services. Shangri-La hotels are located in Australia, Canada, mainland China, Fiji, France, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Maldives, Mongolia, Mauritius, Myanmar, Philippines, Singapore, Sultanate of Oman, Taiwan, Thailand, Turkey, the United Arab Emirates and the United Kingdom. The group has a substantial development pipeline with upcoming projects in Mainland China, Cambodia, Hong Kong, India, Myanmar, Philippines, Qatar and Sri Lanka. For more information and reservations, please contact a travel professional or access the website at www.shangri-la.com .
